title: The Undertaker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, Commune with a dead player.
- At night, Exhume a dead player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you Commune with a dead player, you may send them a single message. They may respond with a single message.
- When you Exhume a dead player, they may act tonight as if they were living.
- You may only Exhume a dead player twice.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid your county of rapscallions and varmint.

desc:
Post 5493
*He claims he can hear voices from the graveyard at night. A priestly man with a shovel.*
